threats.title: Stole credentials
threats.description: An attacker can get access to a users account by stealing their credentials and posing as the authorized user.
threats.mitigation: We can ask the user to use stronger security measures

threats.title: Denying activity
threats.description: A user can deny making a transaction
threats.mitigation: Create a second verification for confirming transactions

threats.title: Stolen credentials
threats.description: Same as the user an attacker can steal the credentials of a admin and make any changes to the system or even steal data.
threats.mitigation: Same as the user. make the admin uses better security measures

threats.title: Denying changes
threats.description: Administrators can deny accessing a users data
threats.mitigation: Keep track of admins database activity

threats.title: Change function
threats.description: An attacker can change the function of the web server
threats.mitigation: Only allow specific people to change the web server

threats.title: Stop web server
threats.description: An attacker can stop the web server from working
threats.mitigation: Use more than one web server

threats.title: Change funtion
threats.description: An attacker can hack the app server and change the functionality of it. They can make it so that the the server can send all data retrieved from the database is send straight to them.
threats.mitigation: You can limit the amount of people that can make changes to a server.

threats.title: Stop app
threats.description: When the attacker can gain access to the server they can stop it from working. This will make other users not be able to use the application.
threats.mitigation: Use multiple servers so that the app can continue to run.

threats.title: Steal data
threats.description: An attacker can gain access to the database and steal all the data the company has.
threats.mitigation: Limit the amount of people who can review the database and only allow authorized users to review and change any data

threats.title: Increase privileges
threats.description: An attacker can gain access to the dashboard and give themselves administration privileges
threats.mitigation: More than one administrator has to confirm the action

threats.title: Change transfer amount
threats.description: An attacker can change the amount a user wanted to transfer
threats.mitigation: Confirm the amount the user wants to transfer before they transfer the money

threats.title: Expedition
threats.description: Attacker can pose as user and go through the login process.
threats.mitigation: Include more password requirements and make more security features
